title: 有关Minecon 2016门票的详情
author: lichi2050
txt_content:
本帖最后由 lichi2050 于 2016-4-19 09:11 编辑 

Mojang原文介绍 http://mojang.com/2016/04/minecon-2016-tickets/
详情 https://beta.minecraft.net/zh-hans/minecon/


Hello future (and past) MINECONners!
Hello 未来（和过去）的MINECONners（Minecon参与者）!

We have excellent news for you all: tickets are going on sale on May 6 and May 7! We’re selling them in two batches to give people in different time-zones a fair chance - you can check out the countdown to each sale time at https://minecon.minecraft.net.
我们有一个非常好的消息带给大家：Minecon 2016门票开售啦！我们会于5月6日起在网络开售门票直到5月7日！我们将分成两批出售让各位即使在不同的时区也能拥有一个公平的机会 - 你可以在https://minecon.minecraft.net检查销售时间.

MINECON 2016 will take place on September 24-25 at Anaheim Convention Center in sun-soaked Southern California, US. It’s going to be the biggest MINECON yet, with 12,000 attendees! And, as always, each of them will receive a swish new cape just for coming along.本届Minecon将于9月24号至9月25日，在 安纳海姆 美国加利福尼亚州举行. 本届将会是最大规模的一届，总共12 000 参与者！并一如即然他（她）们将获得一个Minecon专属披风.

Now onto the details! There’s a lot of info here, but if you plan on purchasing tickets, it’s pretty important you read it:
现在进入细节部分！这里有大量的信息，如果你准备购买门票，建议你详细阅读：

Tickets will be $160 each (3 years old and under are free).门票的价格为每张$160（3岁以及以下的都是免费的）.Tickets will only be sold at https://minecon.minecraft.net, and they will be sold through Eventbrite.门票将只会在https://minecon.minecraft.net出售，它们将通过Eventbrite购买网站出售.6,000 tickets will go on sale at 6pm PDT (that’s Los Angeles time) on Friday, May 6, 2016.6千张门票将会于洛杉矶时间2016年5月6日下午6点开售（国内貌似凌晨2点）.6,000 additional tickets will go on sale at 12pm noon PDT on Saturday, May 7, 2016.另外的6千张门票将会于洛杉矶时间2016年5月7日正午12点开售（国内貌似上午10点）.You will be able to purchase up to 6 tickets on one order.同一订单内一次购买最多6张门票.You will need the name of EACH person you are buying a ticket for at the time you purchase tickets, you’ll need to enter these details to complete your order.购买门票时你必须输入每一位参与者的名字，否则无法完成订单.Tickets cannot be resold and are non-transferrable, the person whose name is on the ticket at the time of purchase is the person who will be admitted to MINECON. This means you cannot resell tickets.门票并不能转售或转让，Minecon 只会允许购买时的登记者进入会场.

Some frequently asked questions:
一些常见的问题：

What will there be to do/see/enjoy at MINECON?
我们可以在Minecon 做/看到/享受 什么？
Loads and loads! There’ll be panels discussing hot Minecraft topics, exhibitors showing off all the cool stuff they’re doing with the game and a bunch of interactive attractions during the event. On Saturday night, there will also be a show on-site for everyone who attends MINECON. Have a look at the videos from last year for an idea of what happens at MINECON.
我们会有很多的展板，各位可以讨论各种Minecraft热点话题，不少的参展商会展示他们的炫酷Minecraft作品，以及一连串的互动活动. 星期六的晚上将会为参加者举办一个现场活动，可以看看我们上一届的Minecon视频.

Will there be a costume contest this year?
本届会不会有服装大赛？

Most definitely! We love having people show off their creativity when it comes to their Minecraft costumes. There will be prizes and accolades for the best of the best. Here is a video of our costume contest from the last MINECON.当然了！我们最喜欢参加者发挥自己的创意去创造属于自己的Minecraft服装了. 最好最好的参赛者将会获得奖品及荣誉唷. 这是上届服装大赛的视频 .

What do I do if it turns out I can’t attend MINECON after I’ve bought a ticket?
如果我因事未能出席的话该怎么办？

You can request a refund up to 15 days before the event.
你可以在活动开始前15天申请退款.

How can I volunteer to be a MINECON Agent?
我要怎样才能成为 Minecon 的 志愿者？

Each year our MINECON Agents help make MINECON possible. It’s a huge event and couldn’t happen without them! If you want to volunteer, head over and fill out this form. If you’re chosen you will not need to purchase a MINECON ticket, but you will put down a deposit of $60 which will be refunded when you complete your service.
每年的Minecon都有不少的志愿者帮忙. 没有了他们，就没有了Minecon！如果你想成为志愿者，就来填一填这一份表格吧。如果你成为了志愿者，你就无需再购买Minecon门票了（志愿者必须年满18岁），但是你必须暂时交$60，完成服务后就会退还.

Can I buy a MINECON ticket just to get the fancy cape?
我可以购买Minecon门票，仅是为了获得独一无二的披风吗？

We want all tickets to go to people who will come and enjoy the event, so only people who come to MINECON will get their cape. When you arrive, we scan your ticket, and only scanned tickets will get a cape.
我们希望所有的门票都售给想来和享受活动的人，所以，只有出席的人才可以获得披风. 当你到达后，我们将会扫描你的票，只有我们扫了你的票，你才会拿到披风唷.

I’m taking my daughter/son/nephew/neighbor to MINECON but I’m an adult and don’t play Minecraft, do I need a ticket for myself as well?
我的 女儿/儿子/侄子/邻居 想来到Minecon，但我可是不玩Minecraft的成年人，我需要为自己买一张票么？

Yes you do! We have players of all ages and we have events and things to do for everyone (even a bunch of cool panels for parents of Minecrafters) so all attendees will need to purchase a ticket.
这可是必须的！我们有不同年龄阶段的玩家，以及安排了不同的活动给所有人（尽管你是一位家长，我们还是安排了一些炫酷的活动），故所有出席的人都需要购买门票。

I have an amazing idea for a panel! Can I tell you, please?
对于活动，我有一个创新的点子！

Yes! But not just yet. Soon you’ll be able to submit panel ideas, and maybe yours will be chosen!
嗯，这不是一个问题，但你能在未来提交你的点子，然后我们也许会采纳唷！

关于FAQ部分参考了一部分2015年的介绍贴.（补充了新增内容）

Any other information you might want will be on the MINECON website at https://minecon.minecraft.net.
其余的信息你可以查看MINECON 网站 https://minecon.minecraft.net.

Cheers!干杯！

-Vu (@vubui)
